mapper.sql: id, player_id, skill_id, skill_level, current_cooldown, last_used_time, learn_time
mapper.select: select ps.id, ps.player_id, ps.skill_id, ps.skill_level, ps.current_cooldown, ps.last_used_time, ps.learn_time, s.id as skill_pk_id, s.name as skill_name, s.type as skill_type, s.attribute as skill_attribute, s.power as skill_power, s.cooldown as skill_cooldown, s.description as skill_description from life_player_skill ps left join life_skill s on ps.skill_id = s.id where ps.player_id = #{playerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by ps.learn_time

select ps.id, ps.player_id, ps.skill_id, ps.skill_level, ps.current_cooldown, ps.last_used_time, ps.learn_time, s.id as skill_pk_id, s.name as skill_name, s.type as skill_type, s.attribute as skill_attribute, s.power as skill_power, s.cooldown as skill_cooldown, s.description as skill_description from life_player_skill ps left join life_skill s on ps.skill_id = s.id where ps.player_id = #{playerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and (ps.current_cooldown = 0 OR ps.last_used_time IS NULL OR TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, ps.last_used_time, NOW()) >= s.cooldown) order by ps.learn_time
mapper.insert: insert into life_player_skill (player_id, skill_id, skill_level, current_cooldown, last_used_time, learn_time) values (#{playerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{skillId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{skillLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentCooldown,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastUsedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{learnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update life_player_skill set player_id = #{playerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, skill_id = #{skillId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, skill_level = #{skillLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_cooldown = #{currentCooldown,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_used_time = #{lastUsedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, learn_time = #{learnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
